edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent

Class Audio.SoundEffectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.Audio.SoundEffectBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Audio

    public static class Audio.SoundEffectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder class for creating sound effects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void play()
      Plays the built sound effect.
      Audio.SoundEffectBuilder setBalance(double balance)
      This method sets the balance for a sound effect.
      Audio.SoundEffectBuilder setCallback(java.lang.Runnable callback)
      Sets a callback for when the sound effect finishes.

      Sets the volume of the sound effect.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • setBalance

        public Audio.SoundEffectBuilder setBalance(double balance)
        This method sets the balance for a sound effect. This can be used to add a sense of direction to sound.
        Parameters:
        balance - a value between -1.0 (left) to 1.0 (right)
        Returns:
        current sound effect being built

      • setVolume

        public Audio.SoundEffectBuilder setVolume(double volume)
        Sets the volume of the sound effect. There is an implicit multiplication by the master volume
        Parameters:
        volume - the volume value between 0.0 and 1.0
        Returns:
        current sound effect being built

      • setCallback

        public Audio.SoundEffectBuilder setCallback(java.lang.Runnable callback)
        Sets a callback for when the sound effect finishes.
        Parameters:
        callback - some action to occur when the sound effect finishes playing
        Returns:
        current sound effect being built

      • play

        public void play()
        Plays the built sound effect.
